alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ozaukee, Fond du Lac, Washington, Dodge and Sheboygan Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 256 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rosendale to near Campbellsport to near Lisbon. Movement was east-northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Fond Du Lac, West Bend, Watertown, Mequon, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Brown Deer, Grafton, Cedarburg, Waupun, Port Washington, Plymouth, Sheboygan Falls, Ripon, Jackson, Mayville, Slinger, North Fond Du Lac and Columbus. People attending The Fond du Lac County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington
